metadata.creator: Presidential Communications Development and Strategic Planning Office
metadata.description: To mark the 116th anniversary of Philippine Independence, we have dissected the Philippine National Anthem revealing its various influences. In this clip you will hear excerpts of the Marcha Real (Spanish National Anthem), Giuseppe Verdiâ€™s Aida (Triumphal March), and La Marseillaise (French National Anthem). These are stitched together with the portions of the Philippine National Anthem believed to have been inspired by these musical pieces.
metadata.subject: audio
metadata.title: Philippine National Anthem Comparison
